channel.title: Wanting to make a bot
channel.description:
hi, i wana try to make my own rs bot, (a bot the runs scripts like rsbot, kbot, etc...) but i have no clue were to start. i have searched throw the tutorials many of times but i can find what i need.
Could someone please tell me what i need and what to do.
Thanks
P.S. could somone possibly make a step by step tutorial on everything to making a bot

item.title: Wanting to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“gleninater, post:1, topic:305322”]hi, i wana try to make my own rs bot, (a bot the runs scripts like rsbot, kbot, etc…) but i have no clue were to start. i have searched throw the tutorials many of times but i can find what i need.

Could someone please tell me what i need and what to do.

Thanks

P.S. could somone possibly make a step by step tutorial on everything to making a bot[/quote]

Why would anybody make you a step by step guide? They might as well make their own bot and rake in the ad money.

Start learning java via http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/ and go from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Wanting to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:4, topic:305322”][quote author=oksuper_ link=topic=401566.msg2976359#msg2976359 date=1254313363]
Hello can anyone provide me with a step-by-step tutorial on how to ban from non-staff user?
[/quote]

seems like you have no moparisthebest experience whatsoever. There isn’t a step-by-step manual that holds your hands and guides you through the process - you shouldn’t start with such a project if you have zero experience.[/quote]
Did you even read what he said?

assuming you didn’t, how do you get experience without starting a project involving the subject you require experience in?

Read full topic

item.title: Wanting to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Hello can anyone provide me with a step-by-step tutorial on how to ban from non-staff user?

seems like you have no moparisthebest experience whatsoever. There isn’t a step-by-step manual that holds your hands and guides you through the process - you shouldn’t start with such a project if you have zero experience.

item.title: Wanting to make a bot

item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

seems like you have no programming experience whatsoever. There isn’t a step-by-step manual that holds your hands and guides you through the process - you shouldn’t start with such a project if you have zero experience.

item.title: Wanting to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @cohen cohen
item.description:
@cohen wrote:

  1. Get familiar with the client
  2. Make your own updater
  3. Make runescape canvas extend yours
  4. Create the bot

Read full topic
